available_product_features.name: Unlimited surveys
available_product_features.description: Create as many surveys as you want.

available_product_features.name: All question types
available_product_features.description: Rating scale (for NPS and the like), multiple choice, single choice, emoji rating, link, free text.

available_product_features.name: Multiple questions
available_product_features.description: Ask up to 10 questions in a single survey.

available_product_features.name: Advanced user targeting
available_product_features.description: Target by URL, user property, or feature flag when used with Feature flags.

available_product_features.name: User sampling
available_product_features.description: Sample users to only survey a portion of the users who match the criteria.

available_product_features.name: Custom colors & positioning
available_product_features.description: Customize the colors of your surveys to match your brand and set survey position.

available_product_features.name: Custom HTML text
available_product_features.description: Add custom HTML to your survey text.

available_product_features.name: API mode
available_product_features.description: Using PostHog.js? No more code required. But if want to create your own UI, we have a full API.

available_product_features.name: Aggregated results
available_product_features.description: See feedback summarized and broken down per response, plus completion rates and drop offs.

available_product_features.name: Templates
available_product_features.description: Use our templates to get started quickly with NPS, customer satisfaction surveys, user interviews, and more.

available_product_features.name: Data retention
available_product_features.description: Keep a historical record of your data.

available_product_features.name: Zapier
available_product_features.description: Zapier lets you connect PostHog with thousands of the most popular apps, so you can automate your work and have more time for what matters mostâ€”no code required.

available_product_features.name: Slack
available_product_features.description: Get notified about new actions in Slack.

available_product_features.name: Microsoft Teams
available_product_features.description: Get notified about new actions in Microsoft Teams.

available_product_features.name: Discord
available_product_features.description: Get notified about new actions in Discord.

available_product_features.name: Transformations
available_product_features.description: Use transformations to filter or modify your incoming data. (Destinations not included, see the Data pipelines addon for product analytics.)

available_product_features.name: Transformation & destination metrics
available_product_features.description: Get metrics on your transformation and destination metrics to see their usage, reliability, and more.

available_product_features.name: Boolean feature flags
available_product_features.description: Turn features on and off for specific users.

available_product_features.name: Multivariate feature flags & experiments
available_product_features.description: Create three or more variants of a feature flag to test or release different versions of a feature.

available_product_features.name: Persist flags across authentication
available_product_features.description: Persist feature flags across authentication events so that flag values don't change when an anonymous user logs in and becomes identified.

available_product_features.name: Test changes without code
available_product_features.description: Use JSON payloads to change text, visuals, or entire blocks of code without subsequent deployments.

available_product_features.name: Multiple release conditions
available_product_features.description: Customize your rollout strategy by user or group properties, cohort, or traffic percentage.

available_product_features.name: Release condition overrides
available_product_features.description: For any release condition, specify which flag value the users or groups in that condition should receive.

available_product_features.name: Flag targeting by groups
available_product_features.description: Target feature flag release conditions by group properties, not just user properties.

available_product_features.name: Local evaluation & bootstrapping
available_product_features.description: Bootstrap flags on initialization so all flags are available immediately, without having to make extra network requests.

available_product_features.name: Flag usage stats
available_product_features.description: See how many times a flag has been evaluated, how many times each variant has been returned, and what values users received.

available_product_features.name: A/B testing
available_product_features.description: Test changes to your product and evaluate the impacts those changes make.

available_product_features.name: Group experiments
available_product_features.description: Target experiments to specific groups of users so everyone in the same group gets the same variant.

available_product_features.name: Funnel & trend experiments
available_product_features.description: Measure the impact of a change on a aggregate values or a series of events, like a signup flow.

available_product_features.name: Secondary experiment metrics
available_product_features.description: Track additional metrics to see how your experiment affects other parts of your app or different flows.

available_product_features.name: Statistical analysis
available_product_features.description: Get a statistical analysis of your experiment results to see if the results are significant, or if they're likely just due to chance.

available_product_features.name: Data retention
available_product_features.description: Keep a historical record of your data.

available_product_features.name: Console logs
available_product_features.description: Debug issues faster by browsing the user's console.

available_product_features.name: Recording playlists
available_product_features.description: Create playlists of certain session recordings to easily find and watch them again in the future.

available_product_features.name: Network performance on recordings
available_product_features.description: See your end-user's network performance and information alongside session recordings.

available_product_features.name: Network monitor
available_product_features.description: Analyze performance and network calls.

available_product_features.name: Download recordings
available_product_features.description: Retain recordings beyond data retention limits.

available_product_features.name: Data retention
available_product_features.description: Keep a historical record of your data.

available_product_features.name: Block sensitive data
available_product_features.description: Disable capturing data from any DOM element with HTML attributes or a customizable config.

available_product_features.name: Share and embed
available_product_features.description: Share replays directly via URL or embed via iframe.

available_product_features.name: Event timeline
available_product_features.description: See a history of everything that happened in a user's session.

available_product_features.name: Filter person properties
available_product_features.description: Filter by person properties to quickly find relevant recordings.

available_product_features.name: Filter events
available_product_features.description: Filter by events to quickly find relevant recordings.

available_product_features.name: DOM Explorer
available_product_features.description: Freeze snapshots of recordings and explore the DOM with your browser dev tools.

available_product_features.name: Dashboards
available_product_features.description: Save trends, funnels, and other insights for easy reference by your whole team.

available_product_features.name: Funnels
available_product_features.description: Visualize user dropoff between a sequence of events. See conversion rate over time, use flexible step ordering, set exclusion steps, and more.

available_product_features.name: Graphs & trends
available_product_features.description: Plot any number of events or actions over time.

available_product_features.name: User paths
available_product_features.description: Limited paths excludes: customizing path insights by setting the maximum number of paths, number of people on each path, how path names appear

available_product_features.name: Insight & dashboard subscriptions
available_product_features.description: Create a subscription for any insight or dashboard in PostHog to receive regular reports with their updates.

available_product_features.name: Advanced paths
available_product_features.description: Customize your path insights by setting the maximum number of paths, number of people on each path, and how path names should appear.

available_product_features.name: Dashboard permissions
available_product_features.description: Restrict access to dashboards within the organization to only those who need it.

available_product_features.name: Tags & text cards
available_product_features.description: Keep organized by adding tags to your dashboards, cohorts and more. Add text cards and descriptions to your dashboards to provide context to your team.

available_product_features.name: Ingestion taxonomy
available_product_features.description: Ingestion taxonomy

available_product_features.name: Correlation analysis
available_product_features.description: Automatically highlight significant factors that affect the conversion rate of users within a funnel.

available_product_features.name: Dashboard tags
available_product_features.description: Organize dashboards with tags.

available_product_features.name: Lifecycle
available_product_features.description: Discover how your active users break down, highlighting those who have recently stopped being active or those who have just become active for the first time.

available_product_features.name: Data retention
available_product_features.description: Keep a historical record of your data.

available_product_features.name: Tracked users
available_product_features.description: Track users across devices and sessions.

available_product_features.name: Team members
available_product_features.description: PostHog doesn't charge per seat add your entire team!

available_product_features.name: Projects
available_product_features.description: Organize environments within a project. Share dashboards, insights and more across environments without duplicating work.

available_product_features.name: Environments
available_product_features.description: Create separate silos of data within a project. Data belongs to a single environment and all queries are environment-specific.

available_product_features.name: API access
available_product_features.description: Access your data via our developer-friendly API.

available_product_features.name: SSO via Google, Github, or Gitlab
available_product_features.description: Log in to PostHog with your Google, Github, or Gitlab account.

available_product_features.name: Project permissions
available_product_features.description: Restrict access to data within the organization to only those who need it.

available_product_features.name: White labeling
available_product_features.description: Use your own branding in your PostHog organization.

available_product_features.name: Community support
available_product_features.description: Get help from other users and PostHog team members in our Community forums.

available_product_features.name: Slack (dedicated channel)
available_product_features.description: Get help directly from our support team in a dedicated Slack channel shared between you and the PostHog team.

available_product_features.name: Direct access to engineers
available_product_features.description: Get help directly from our product engineers via email. No wading through multiple support people before you get help.

available_product_features.name: Terms and conditions
available_product_features.description: Terms and conditions

available_product_features.name: Security assessment
available_product_features.description: Security assessment

products.name: Feature flags & A/B testing
products.headline: Safely roll out features and A/B tests to specific users or groups
products.description: Test changes with small groups of users before rolling out wider. Analyze usage with product analytics and session replay.

plans.name: Feature flags & A/B testing
plans.description: Test changes with small groups of users before rolling out wider. Analyze usage with product analytics and session replay.

features.name: Boolean feature flags
features.description: Turn features on and off for specific users.

features.name: Persist flags across authentication
features.description: Persist feature flags across authentication events so that flag values don't change when an anonymous user logs in and becomes identified.

features.name: Test changes without code
features.description: Use JSON payloads to change text, visuals, or entire blocks of code without subsequent deployments.

features.name: Multiple release conditions
features.description: Customize your rollout strategy by user or group properties, cohort, or trafic percentage.

features.name: Release condition overrides
features.description: For any release condition, specify which flag value the users or groups in that condition should receive.

features.name: Flag targeting by groups
features.description: Target feature flag release conditions by group properties, not just user properties.

features.name: Local evaluation & bootstrapping
features.description: Bootstrap flags on initialization so all flags are available immediately, without having to make extra network requests.

features.name: Flag usage stats
features.description: See how many times a flag has been evaluated, how many times each variant has been returned, and what values users received.

features.name: Data retention
features.description: Keep a historical record of your data.

features.description: See feedback summarized and broken down per response, plus completion rates and drop offs.

features.name: Templates
features.description: Use our templates to get started quickly with NPS, customer satisfaction surveys, user interviews, and more.

features.name: Data retention
features.description: Keep a historical record of your data.

features.name: Link somewhere
features.description: Send users to a webpage or invite them to book a meeting with a calendar invite.

features.name: Slack notifications
features.description: Send realtime survey responses to a Slack channel.

features.name: Customizable wait periods
features.description: Set a delay before a survey opens.
